articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/kslcom/
articles.title: 1 in 20 Americans used ivermectin, hydroxychloroquine to treat COVID-19 - KSL.com
articles.description: A recent study has found 1 in 20 people in the U.S. who contracted COVID-19 used non-evidence-based treatment, such as ivermectin and hydroxychloroquine, due to beliefs in vaccine-related misinformation.
